title: Social Constructivist Instructional Design Strategies in Web-Based Learning Environments (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced Expertise in Scientific Fields and Basic Digital Literacy Skills
context.additional_context: Web Tool-Based Collaborative Learning and Project-Based Assessment-Centric Environment

learning_goals: Learners will utilize online collaboration tools (chat, whiteboard, etc.) at over 80% proficiency to solve scientific problems in a VR simulation environment
Instructors can design three strategies to transition from lecture-based instruction to constructivist teaching methods using web-based tools
Learners and instructors evaluate online interaction frequency (5+ times/week) and qualitative standards with over 90% satisfaction
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
